name: @arnaud-barre/config-loader
description: Loads a TS config file via esbuild and caches transpilation
author: Arnaud Barr√© (https://github.com/ArnaudBarre)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --strict --declaration src/index.ts --outDir dist && scripts/bundle.ts
scripts.publish: bun tsc && bun lint-ci && bun prettier-ci && bun run build && cd dist && npm publish
